ing: 1/4 cup dry vermouth or dry white wine
des: "These sauces can be made in minutes as the cooked steaks rest. To make the sauce ahead, leave out the butter or cream. Reheat just before serving, adding water if the sauce has reduced too much, then whisk in the butter or cream. This amount is enough for four steaks, but the formulas can be recalculated if you're serving more guests."
ins: Combine vermouth and broth in a measuring cup. Follow basic sauce instructions below, whisking horseradish and butter into reduced liquid.
